title: 3 word logos
content:
I am developing a corporate brand for a company called 'All Styled Steel'  
This can't be abbreviated for obvious reasons, so all 3 words need to be included.  
At the moment i'm trying to find examples of good logos with 3 or more words to look at.  
I'm also trying to figure out whether this can be just typographic or if it needs a mark.

It would be really helpful if you could link me to some logos with a few words in them.  
thanks!
author: victor ivanov

comments.content:
thank you!

i did not know of these!  
great resources!
